name: ATP Jets
about: ATP JETS, a subsidiary of ATP Flight School, is a leading provider of airline pilot training, located near the Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport in Texas. Founded to help military pilots transition to commercial aviation, ATP JETS now offers comprehensive training programs, including the FAA-approved Airline Transport Pilot Certification Training Program (ATP CTP) and Airbus A320 type rating courses. With state-of-the-art facilities, including 14 Flight Simulation Training Devices and 16 full-motion simulators, ATP JETS trains nearly 500 pilots per month. The school has partnered with 57 air carriers and has graduated over 20,000 ATP CTP students, making it a pivotal institution in preparing pilots for the airline industry. ATP JETS offers full financing options, GI Bill eligibility, and supportive services like visa assistance and accommodation, ensuring a seamless training experience.
